entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 2:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: E 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets ending late in the afternoon then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
